timeline.message: Disable spring cloud config for now.
Use dev deployment for now in prod profile for Hazelcast.
Change some log messages to INFO.
Start adding registry for websocket messages.
Set User Destination & Registry Broadcast, change team map to hazelcast.

Revert "Set User Destination & Registry Broadcast, change team map to hazelcast."

This reverts commit 30a009d25a2d609981700c4267b145a9ba8dfd54.

Revert "Start adding registry for websocket messages."

This reverts commit 614331ce93910fba8ddd668cc5a396f5a3f6f8ab.

timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText: This was the auto generated code, I've applied your suggestion.
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.bodyText: Should "Artemis" be a constant? Or can we even inject and use spring.application.name OR hibernate.cache.hazelcast.instance_name?
timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText: I will change it to hibernate.cache.hazelcast.instance_name.
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.message: Merge branch 'feature/jhipster-registry' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/jhipster-registry
change max size policy to Per_Node in Hazelcast
add entry to application.yml to prevent warning during tests
Remove unneeded config values and load instance name from config.
Add instance name to test config.
